column4: does someone here have problems connecting to googletalk, too? Sometimes it works, but most of the time gaim tells me error while reading

i get it most of the time, then i wait an hour and it might work... i wonder whether it's a local problem or their servers are overloaded. Very annoying is that metacity seems to crash each time it fails on breezy...
yeah, once i'm connected it stays for hours... bizzarre
